New Records: Virat Kohli scored 85 runs before being caught
Ravindra Jadeja took 3 wickets for 28 runs
Kuldeep Yadav took 2 wickets for 42 runs
Key Match Events: Mitchell Starc and Josh Hazlewood sent India's top order packing
Mitch Marsh dropped Virat Kohli which proved costly
Australia struggled to handle spin and faced 174 dot balls
Pre-Game Insights: The match was India's World Cup opener
Australia's spin options were limited with only Adam Zampa as a front-line spinner
The pitch offered plenty of turn which India's spinners exploited
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins expressed frustration over the dropped catch
India's spin bowling was praised for their efficiency
Australia's batting struggled against spin and faced high dot balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: The slow wicket allowed India's spinners to dominate
Dewy conditions affected play in the later stages
Australia's batting performance was sloppy at times
